featured.name: Humngry
featured.description: Privacy-first meal tracker that helped users track nutrition without data collection. Served 1000+ recipes offline, improving user health tracking.
highlights: Eliminated data surveillance for meal tracking

featured.name: WeatherWeb
featured.description: AI-powered weather app that simplified weather checking for autistic users. Reduced cognitive load with clean, distraction-free interface.
highlights: Simplified weather access for autistic users

featured.name: Nexus Search
featured.description: Privacy-focused search engine that protected user data while providing fast results. Alternative to surveillance-based search platforms.
